comments.raw_text: In nsDocumentViewer::Open we have a check for puppet widgets, in which case we do a widget attachment. We should check whether other widgets (currently only Windows is relevant) can use that as well, so the check can be simplified and harmonized. See https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=610670#c104
comments.author: azakai@mozilla.com
